snippet: The Russian club Anzhi Makhachkala signed the coveted Brazilian playmaker Willian from Shakhtar Donetsk in a deal worth about $48 million.
abstract: Russian soccer club Anzhi Makhachkala signs coveted Brazilian player Willian from Shakhtar Donetsk in deal worth about $48 million.
lead_paragraph: The Russian club Anzhi Makhachkala signed the coveted Brazilian playmaker Willian from Shakhtar Donetsk in a deal worth about $48 million.

headline.seo: Anzhi Makhachkala Signs Willian from Shakhtar Donetsk
